snippet: Exxon sought as much as $12 billion in compensation after President Hugo Chávez ordered the nationalization of the Cerro Negro oil project in 2007.
abstract: Venezuela Pres Hugo Chavez says country will not recognize ruling by World Bank panel in an arbitration case with Exxon Mobil; Exxon is seeking as much as $12 billion in compensation after the nationalization of the Cerro Negro oil project in 2007.
